headline: Duterte Bans Cabinet From Visiting U.S. After a Visa Is Denied
abstract: The Philippine president issued the order after one of the architects of his bloody drug war was denied a visa for the United States.
lead_paragraph: MANILA — President Rodrigo Duterte of the Philippines has ordered all members of his cabinet not to travel to the United States after Washington blacklisted his former national police chief over the government’s drug war, which has left thousands dead, a top aide said Thursday.
